verses.english: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -
verses.hausa: Ka yi karatu da sunan Ubangijinka, wanda Ya yi halitta.

verses.english: Created man from a clinging substance.
verses.hausa: Ya hahitta mutum daga gudan jini.

verses.english: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -
verses.hausa: Ka yi karatu, kuma UbangiJinka shi ne Mafi karimci.
Wanda Ya sanar (da mutum) game da alƙalami.

verses.english: Taught man that which he knew not.
verses.hausa: Ya sanar da mutum abin da bai sani ba.
A'aha! Lalle, ne mutum haƙĩƙa, yana girman kai (ya ƙi karatu).
Dõmin yã ga kansa, yã wadãta.

verses.english: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne zuwa ga Ubangijinka makoma take.

verses.english: Have you seen the one who forbids
verses.hausa: Shin, kã ga wanda ke hana.

verses.english: Have you seen if he is upon guidance
verses.hausa: Ashe, kã gani, idan (shi bãwan) ya kasance a kan shiriya?
Ko ya yi umurni da taƙawa?

verses.english: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -
verses.hausa: Ashe, kã gani, idan (shi mai hanin) ya ƙaryata, kuma ya jũya bãya?

verses.english: Does he not know that Allah sees?
verses.hausa: Ashe, bai sani ba cewa Allah Yanã gani?

verses.arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.english: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -
verses.hausa: A'aha! Lalle ne, idan bai hanu ba, lalle ne zã Mu ja gãshin makwarkwaɗa.

verses.english: Then let him call his associates;
We will call the angels of Hell.
verses.hausa: Zã Mu kirayi zabaniyãwa (mala'iku mãsu girma).

verses.english: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].
verses.hausa: A'aha kada ka bĩ shi. Kuma ka yi tawali'u, kuma ka nemi kusanta (zuwa ga Ubangijinka).
